transArray.content: In the past few months, I have chosen his store every time I visit Beijing. The front desk is attentive and the sanitation of Orange has always been very good. There is really no need to worry about sanitation. There is a subway station opposite and it is very convenient to travel.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and taking the time to share your stay experience with us. It is our honor to have a clean and comfortable stay. As you said, the hotel is located in the Badali Automobile Park on the West Fourth Ring Road, 10 minutes' walk from the subway. It only takes a five-minute walk to Haidian Wuluju Station on Line 6. Public transportation is accessible in all directions and travel is convenient. Thank you for your support and recognition, which makes all our staff at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel confident on the road ahead. We look forward to working with you. Every encounter! I wish you all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
